entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Dolbeau-Mistassini

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
